about_the_game:
After school, when a heavy rain that never stops falling makes it difficult for the students to go home
The relationship between the two, who were spending the day in the club room
The relationship between the two of them in the club room was shortened after that day...


With a classmate and a quiet girlfriend.
Conversations and chats on the way to school
Messages during class
Calls before bedtime
You can experience a simulated school life with these interactions!






Heroine who keeps moving by Live2D
　Conversation part where facial expressions change

　Because this work uses Live2D
　Except for some event stills
　When the heroine appears on the screen
　The animation will continue to play.
　
Daily life with her classmate
　Before going to school, you can communicate with her via a messaging app.

　Chatting with her before HR
　Messaging her secretly during class
　Spending recess together
　Sending messages before bedtime
　Falling asleep while talking
　
　You can spend such a common day with her in a relaxed atmosphere.
detailed_description:
After school, when a heavy rain that never stops falling makes it difficult for the students to go home
The relationship between the two, who were spending the day in the club room
The relationship between the two of them in the club room was shortened after that day...


With a classmate and a quiet girlfriend.
Conversations and chats on the way to school
Messages during class
Calls before bedtime
You can experience a simulated school life with these interactions!






Heroine who keeps moving by Live2D
　Conversation part where facial expressions change

　Because this work uses Live2D
　Except for some event stills
　When the heroine appears on the screen
　The animation will continue to play.
　
Daily life with her classmate
　Before going to school, you can communicate with her via a messaging app.

　Chatting with her before HR
　Messaging her secretly during class
　Spending recess together
　Sending messages before bedtime
　Falling asleep while talking
　
　You can spend such a common day with her in a relaxed atmosphere.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 800x600 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 800x600 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: Features include Live2D animation of the heroine, whose facial expressions change during conversations. The game depicts daily interactions with classmates, such as messages before school, chats during recess, and calls before bedtime, creating a relaxed atmosphere.
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English
*languages with full audio support
